channel.title: Publications on Prakhar Kulshreshtha
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Prakhar Kulshreshtha

item.title: Dynamic character graph via online face clustering for movie analysis
item.description: Constructing and utilizing the character interaction graph obtained using online clustering for two movie analysis tasks: narrative structure (acts) segmentation and major character retrieval

item.title: Annotation-free Quality_Estimation of Food Grains using Deep Neural Network
item.description: Computer Vision for instance segmentation of food grains for Automatic Assaying using a Smartphone Camera

item.title: An online algorithm for constrained face clustering in videos
item.description: A shot-wise online face clustering algorithm that uses several spatio-temporal constraints, along with FaceNet features, to obtain a robust representation of the facetracks
